tool.name: Filter FASTQ reads
tool.command: fastq-filter -o '$output1' \ #echo "'" + "|".join(filter + ":" + str(value) for filter, value in $filters) + "'\" '$input1'
tool.help: mean_quality:<quality> The mean quality of the FASTQ record is equal or above the given quality value. median_quality:<quality> The median quality of the FASTQ record is equal or above the given quality value. min_length:<length> The length of the sequence in the FASTQ record is at least min_length max_length:<length> The length of the sequence in the FASTQ record is at most max_length
